h4.PartitionDestroyByIdx (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_PartitionDestroyByIdx_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: iPartitionIdx (int)*
Destroys an existing partition by index.  Returns the index destroyed, or -1 on failure.


h4.PartitionDestroyCurrent (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_PartitionDestroyCurrent_GameServerLib]
Destroys the current partition for a player


h4.PartitionDumpLogs (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_PartitionDumpLogs_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: iPartitionIdx (int)*
dump out all partition debug logs to a file. specify the partition IDX, 0 means all
